comment.author: 21686909@N07
comment._content: Skulling or rowing would be about the only thing Cornell could beat Wisconsin in today, but Cornell is a great school in a lovely setting. So, this was taken on the Hudson River up in P'kipsy. Ah, here we go: ecommons.cornell.edu/bitstream/1813/3545/7/030_34.pdf

comment.author: 89499427@N00
comment._content:
wiping the fog off the glass.
leaving fingerprints.
gazing into the past.

the Hudson is very beautiful.so is the history.
